TIDY5E.Group.EmptyMembersTabHint: This group is empty. Drop an actor from the sidebar to add a member.
TIDY5E.Group.PrimaryParty.Label: Primary Party
TIDY5E.SheetEdit.Description: Toggle visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
TIDY5E.SheetLock.Description: Toggle lock for sensitive fields that should not change often
TIDY5E.SheetLock.Empty.Hint: Start by adding a class and your first items. Then, use the item menu or right-click and choose "Add to Sheet tab" to add them here.
TIDY5E.EmptyFavorites: Right-click and Favorite, or drag anything from your sheet here to for quick access.
TIDY5E.Ability.EditScore.label: Edit Score
TIDY5E.SearchHint: Start typing to show search results
TIDY5E.SpellSourceIdentifierLabelHint: The actor who has this spell does not have the source class that is specified here.

TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.Title: Tab Configuration: {documentName}
TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.SelectionTab.Title: Tab Selection
TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.VisibilityTab.Title: Tab Visibility
TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.UnsupportedDocumentErrorMessage: The document type {documentType} is not currently set up for tab selection.
TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.AtLeastOneRequiredErrorMessage: At least one tab is required.
TIDY5E.TabConfiguration.Explanation: Any tabs that the user or sheet are configured not to see (e.g., disabling the journal in config settings) will still not appear on the sheet, even if selected.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.ItemIdentificationP.name: Item Identification Permission
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.ItemIdentificationP.hint: Determines which type of user is able to access the UI controls for identifying items.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeFlagsInSpell.name: Include Flags in Spell Scroll Creation
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.IncludeFlagsInSpell.hint: Spells can sometimes contain special data from other modules which can be useful to carry over into a spell scroll. Enable to copy all flag-based data to the spell scroll upon creation.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.ShowWhenEmptyTooltip: All tabs with item tables have a set of default sections which are always shown even when there are no items in the section. Always show this section, even when empty.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.LimitToSpecificSheetsLabel: Limit Shown Section to Specific Sheets
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.TabCustomSections.LimitToSpecificTabsLabel: Limit Shown Section to Specific Tabs

TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.WorldThemeSettings.name: Theme Settings
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.WorldThemeSettings.label: Configure Theme Settings
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.WorldThemeSettings.hint: New Tidy Sheets Only: Establish the default theme settings for your game world. These apply to all sheet types.

TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.Homebrew.name: Homebrew
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.Homebrew.label: Configure Homebrew
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.Homebrew.hint: Enable and configure homebrew options provided by this module.

TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.HeaderControlConfigu.name: Header Controls
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.HeaderControlConfigu.label: Configure Header Controls
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.HeaderControlConfigu.hint: New Tidy Sheets Only: Configure the location of sheet header controls.

TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.TabConfiguration.name: Sheet Tabs
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.TabConfiguration.label: Configure Sheet Tabs
TIDY5E.SettingsMenu.TabConfiguration.hint: New Tidy Sheets Only: Configure which tabs are visible for all actor and item sheets.

TIDY5E.Settings.BankedInspiration.title: Banked Inspiration

TIDY5E.Settings.EnableBankedInspiration.name: Enable Banked Inspiration
TIDY5E.Settings.EnableBankedInspiration.hint: Enable this option to allow the user to set a feature item as an inspiration source. Look for the option as a Context Menu item on feature items with uses.

TIDY5E.Settings.BankedInspirationGmOnly.name: Banked Inspiration Management - GM Only
TIDY5E.Settings.BankedInspirationGmOnly.hint: Enable this option to limit banked inspiration management to the GM.

TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.name: World Settings
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.hint: Adjust world-level settings to customize the Tidy 5e Sheets experience. These settings are saved to this Foundry world and apply to all relevant Tidy 5e Sheets content.
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.label: World Settings
TIDY5E.WorldSettings.Menu.title: World Settings (GM Only)

TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.name: User Settings
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.hint: Customize your own version of Tidy 5e Sheets. These settings are saved to your browser and apply to your sheets.
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.label: User Settings
TIDY5E.UserSettings.Menu.title: User Settings: {userName}

TIDY5E.Settings.InitialSheetTab.name: Initial Sheet Tab
TIDY5E.Settings.InitialSheetTab.hint: Shows the indicated tab when opening a sheet for the first time.

TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultDeathSaveRoll.name: Default Death Save Roll
TIDY5E.Settings.DefaultDeathSaveRoll.hint: Determines the default roll type to use when rolling a death saving throw.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFi.name: Use Multiclass Spellbook Filter
TIDY5E.Settings.UseMulticlassSpellbookFi.hint: Allows filtering spells by class in the spellbook tab. The spell must be associated with a class using the Class selector on the spell edit sheet.

TIDY5E.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepare.name: Allow Cantrips to be Prepared
TIDY5E.Settings.AllowCantripsToBePrepare.hint: The "cantrip formulas" optional rule from Tasha's Cauldron of Everything allows wizards to prepare cantrips after a long rest in the same way that they do with leveled spells. Prepared cantrips do not count toward total prepared spells.

TIDY5E.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.name: Lock Currency
TIDY5E.Settings.LockMoneyChanges.hint: Prevents non-GMs from making changes to currency.

TIDY5E.Settings.UseGroupSheetMemberSecur.name: Use Group Sheet Member Security
TIDY5E.Settings.UseGroupSheetMemberSecur.hint: Enables GM control of what group member information a user can see on the group sheet. When the player has no permission to a group member, the group sheet does not show that member or its aggregate information. With Limited permission, the user can see the member's name but no other information. With Observer or greater, the user can see all group sheet information about the member.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListLimitActionsTo.name: Limit Actions to Cantrips
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListLimitActionsTo.hint: Instead of showing all spells that deal damage in the Actions tab/panel by default, limits to only cantrips. This is the default D&DBeyond behavior.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeMinuteL.name: Include Minute-long Spells as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeMinuteL.hint: Includes spells with a duration of one minute or less (e.g. 1 round) and an activation time of 1 Action or 1 Bonus Action (e.g. Bless, Bane, Command) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeSpellsW.name: Include Spells with Active Effects as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeSpellsW.hint: Includes spells with active effects attached (e.g. Barkskin) in the Actions tab/panel by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeConsuma.name: Include Consumables as Actions
TIDY5E.Settings.ActionListIncludeConsuma.hint: Includes consumables which have an activation cost (Action, Bonus Action, etc) in the Actions list by default.

TIDY5E.Settings.InlineActivitiesPosition.name: Inline Activities Position
TIDY5E.Settings.InlineActivitiesPosition.hint: When expanding an item, activities for that item are shown. Use this setting to determine if activities are put at the top, before the item description, or bottom, below the item description, buttons, and tags.

TIDY5E.Settings.Reset.name: Reset Settings to Default
TIDY5E.Settings.Reset.hint: This will reset all of the settings of back to the active game system's default. This affects "world"-scoped settings only, such as GM options.

dialogs.title: Reset Module Settings
dialogs.content: Are you sure you want to reset all of the module settings to the current system's defaults? This cannot be undone.

TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.name: Set Tidy as Default Sheet
TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.hint: If you would like to set Tidy 5e Sheets as your default for one or more document types, but the core default sheets config menu is not working as expected, use this menu to select your preferences.
TIDY5E.Settings.SheetPreferences.explanation: Select all document types where you would prefer Tidy 5e Sheets to be the default.

TIDY5E.Settings.About.name: About
TIDY5E.Settings.About.hint: Information about the Tidy 5e Sheets module.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.logoAltText: A heater shield with four stars and the words 'Tidy 5e' on the front.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.GithubParagraph: Do you have a feature idea? Is something wrong? Submit a {urlStart}Github Issue{urlEnd}.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.DiscordParagraph: {urlStart}Tidy 5e Sheets Discord Server{urlEnd}: Discuss new feature ideas, get help from others, and track progress of this module.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.LocalizationParagraph: {urlStart}Weblate{urlEnd}: Do you localize web content? Tidy 5e Sheets could use your help! Go to the Weblate website to see our localization progress in various languages. This module is accepting new language translations and modifications to existing translations.
TIDY5E.Settings.About.FinancialSupportParagraph: If you like Tidy 5e Sheets and want to support it financially, here are some ways to do it:

TIDY5E.Settings.GlobalCustomSections.name: Global Custom Sections
TIDY5E.Settings.GlobalCustomSections.hint: World custom sections which can be configured for various purposes. Global Custom Sections will always be included in the Section Selector.

TIDY5E.Settings.Debug.name: Enable Debugging
TIDY5E.Settings.Debug.hint: Prints debug messages to the console.

SheetMenu.name: Tidy Theme Settings
SheetMenu.hint: Classic Tidy Sheets Only: Customize the colors of Tidy 5e Sheets.

Sheet.title: Theme Settings: {userName}
Sheet.importError: Theme import failed. See console for more details.
Sheet.explanation: Select what color you wish to use for each option. The value "#00000000" is equivalent to disabling the color.

TIDY5E.ThemeSettings.hint: Customize your sheet to create an immersive experience that complements your game.

TIDY5E.ThemeSettings.SheetTheme.title: Sheet Theme
TIDY5E.ThemeSettings.SheetTheme.hint: For best results, choose a color near the center of the color palette.
TIDY5E.ThemeSettings.SpellcastingMethodColors.title: Spellcasting Method Colors

TIDY5E.Utilities.IncludeSpellbookInNpcSt: Include Spellbook sections in the Statblock tab

TIDY5E.SpellSourceClassAssignments.Ident: The spell's source class identifier appears here. To assign an identifier which the character doesn't own, enter the class identifier in this text field.

TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleSheetLock.Hint: If a Tidy sheet is the current active window in the UI, this keybinding toggles the sheet lock.
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleHeaderMenu.Name: Toggle Header Menu
TIDY5E.Keybindings.ToggleHeaderMenu.Hint: If a Tidy sheet is the current active window in the UI, this keybinding toggles the sheet header menu.
